title: WTF wal-mart! Everything I bought today was bad
body:
Frozen pizza, crust won't crisp for some reason, cooked it till it was starting to burn and the crust was still mush.

Quart of milk, open the cap and there is half inch of slime on the cap and it tasted weird. 

Bought a little cup of what is supposed to be coconut creme pie but somehow it was switched for banana creme (I FKING HATE BANANA CREME). 

Finally I got this fancy new pimento cheese because I like pimento and it looked much more real and had peppers and stuff in it. Then I get home and try it out and I am confused because it shook like jelly when I opened it up and I was able to just dip a hunk of bread in and scoop it out with ease. Pimento is usually much firmer in consistency. It tasted nothing like any pimento cheeses I had had in the past. I turn the damn thing around and look at the ingredients and the freaking thing had MAYO as the first and main ingredient. And not even real mayo, it was that fake crap stuff that is made to last centuries that cheap fast food places use. 

I have never felt so cheated in my life, my entire dinner has been ruined. :(

{{sticker:sg-janna}}
